test-set.name: xp-striding-climbing-consumingB
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Climbing, RS: Consuming Parent or ancestor(-or-self) axis on child axis selecting non U{element, document}} is climbing and remains consuming, provided rh side selects U{element, document}

test-case.name: xp-striding-climbing-consumingB001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: climbing, RS: consuming Base expression: comment() Separators: / With axes: parent, ancestor, ancestor-or-self With node types: element, document, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests

test-case.name: xp-striding-climbing-consumingB002
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: climbing, RS: consuming Base expression: child::comment() Separators: / With axes: parent, ancestor, ancestor-or-self With node types: element, document, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
